lingpy.compare.lexstat.LexStat.align_pairs¶

LexStat.align_pairs(idxA, idxB, method='lexstat', mode='global', gop=-2, scale=0.5, factor=0.3, restricted_chars='_T', distance=True, concept=None, pprint=True, return_distance=False, **keywords)¶

Align all or some words of a given pair of languages.
